description: This file contains a singleton object Formatters with utility functions to format monetary values, ratings, and estimated time of arrival (ETA) for display in the app.

methods.name: moneyFromCents
methods.description: Formats an integer amount in cents to a dollar string, e.g., '$12.34'.

methods.name: ratingText
methods.description: Formats a double rating to a string with a star symbol, e.g., '★ 4.2'.

methods.name: etaText
methods.description: Formats minimum and maximum ETA values into a string, e.g., '25–35 min'.
